products.name: Mobile
details: iQOO Z6 5G (Dynamo Black, 4GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | Snapdragon® 695 5G | 120Hz FHD+ Display | 5000mAh Battery | No Cost EMI Upto 9 Monthss

products.name: Watch
details: Heart Rate Monitor, Menstrual Cycle Tracking, Sleep & Step Tracking, Multi Sport Modes, Smart Notifications, 1.3 IPS Touch Screen Display, IP68 Waterproof, Bluetooth v5.0 & Android and iOS compatible, 10 Day Battery - 45 Day Standby

products.name: Laptop
details: Processor: 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 (up to 4.1 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost Technology, 6 MB L3 cache, 2 cores)
Memory: 8 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (2 x 4 GB), upgradable up to 16 GB (2 x 8 GB) | Storage: 256 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD
Display: 14-Inch (35.6 cm) FHD IPS micro-edge, 250 nits, 45% NTSC (1920 x 1080)
Operating System & Software: Pre-loaded Windows 10 Home with lifetime validity | Pre-installed Microsoft Office Home & Student 2019, Alexa Built-in
